textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns blah blah...🤦‍♂‍

outroText: May you be filled with happiness and joy on this special day. May all your dreams come true and have a wonderful year ahead. Happy Birthday!
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
